title: My account has been mistakened for someone in bronze 4.
body:
So I had just finished playing my promotionals and I was wondering why I am all of a sudden placed from silver 4 down to bronze 4 after playing 3000 games of a 90% consistency of afks and feeder, that I would have to personally carry through to be able to kill multiple fed enemies and split push effectively enough to win games by myself.

I have been in bronze 3 times and I have got myself back up to silver 3 times, so I am just wondering why after over 1500 hours of struggling through the ranking system, I am placed into somewhere I spent countless hours grinding my face along a concrete path getting out of. If my teams were even I would not mind, but I dont understand why it is already almost impossible for me to climb and then after we won 5 out of 10 games in provisionals I get demoted by an entire league.

I am making every attempt to play professionally and I just can't get past my own teammates let alone the 4 fed enemies I have to outplay after that. Why am I being put down an entire league?

I have done quite well to not shroud this entire post in inappropriate language.

replies.body:
>I have been in bronze 3 times and I have got myself back up to silver 3 times,

Doesn't this just prove that your skill is inconsistent?

>I get demoted by an entire league.

You weren't demoted. The season reset and that's where you were placed.

Thank you for refraining from the abusive language, I appreciate it.

This game is a team game, where ranked is a place you can go to have a fair game with other people. If you're getting team mates that supposedly "can't do their job" or "steal the kills", then you can be assured that there are also players like that on the enemy team.

It's all about perspective, you know?

I play starcraft, used to be masters, I am now diamond close to being masters again.

My skill would be relevant only if I was the only player on the team, but even if I screwed up my team should be able to pick up the pieces half the time right?

If I am doing my job effectively in every situation then I should be racking up the wins right because my team should be evenly skilled with the enemy team more often than not right?

I just do not think it is fair that while I am trying to get to challenger, I am repeatedly having to strain myself trying to get out of a league for an entire season only to be placed back in there when I have been winning more games than I have been losing.

I know all about perspective and I know when the enemy team is detrimenting their own team.

Shouldn't my placement be determined on last season and by a small amount during preseason, not just massively dropped on the start of a new season?

And that's how it is.

I'm sorry about, your placement is determined by the opponents you verse. And who you verse is really up to luck.

It's a shame that it was so extreme.

But my skill is not the issue

If my teammates save their abilities to steal the kills and take my farm and then dont have them when they need them they die which feeds my lane, so then im behind in 2 different ways which ends up detrimenting me heaps while the enemy gets to carry. That is just in my lane, the rest of the team is losing the living crap out of their lane so I am unable to carry them when they cant do their job, this makes it literally impossible to do anything from that point because there is no outplaying the enemy at that point.

I completely agree with you man, but if you have the skills you'll get there. I was placed in Bronze 1 in back to back seasons (3 and 4) and made gold in both those seasons. It sucks I know, but if you believe you can achieve :)
